message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling this amazing product to you. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $100?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a profit. How about we meet in the middle at $132.50?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $115?
I'm not willing to go all the way down to $115, but I can meet you at $125. It's a fair price for this amazing product!
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $125. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?
